sheath.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a cover for the blade of a knife or sword
sheath.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: His sword was back in its sheath.
sheath.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a protective covering that fits closely around something
sheath.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The wire is covered by an outer plastic sheath.
sheath.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: She was wearing a plain black sheath.
